description: {"blocks":[{"key":"c84vk","text":"This protocol describes the preparation of cell lysate from and iPSC-derived neurons (I3 Neurons, dopaminergic) and the immunoblotting procedure.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":87,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"cpai9","text":"TBS:  Tris-Cl,   NaCl, adjust   .","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":5,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":15,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":30,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8q0aq","text":"TBST: TBS with 0.1% TWEEN-20 (Sigma-Aldrich).","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b6s7u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"50","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"150","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":28}},"2":{"type":"ph","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"","id":0,"number":"07.5"}}}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"civ7v","text":"Grow I3 Neurons and dopaminergic (DA) neurons on six-well plates (3-5 × 105 cells/well). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":6,"length":1},{"style":"sup","offset":74,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aj6mk","text":"After differentiation in their respective maturation media, wash the neurons with   ice-cold PBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":82,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d6ibg","text":"Lyse the cells  in   1xRIPA lysis buffer (10X RIPA lysis buffer, Sigma-Aldrich) supplemented with complete™ EDTA-free protease inhibitor cocktail (Roche) and PhosSTOP phosphatase inhibitor cocktail (Roche).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":19,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6f0ft","text":"Determine the protein concentration in sample using Pierce BCA assay (ThermoFisher). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9d71","text":"Incubate appropriate volume of cell lysate solution at   for   in SDS sample buffer containing 1% 2-mercaptoethanol (Sigma).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":55,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":61,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"95","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2u03n","text":"Separate the extracted proteins by SDS-PAGE in Mini-PROTEAN TGX precast polyacrylamide gels (Bio-Rad) at 250V and transfer to nitrocellulose membranes (Bio-Rad) at 100 V for   or 75 V for   (for high molecular weight proteins: \u003e150 kDa).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":174,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":188,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dt240","text":"Block the nitrocellulose membranes for   with 5% non-fat milk (AmericanBIO) in TBST (tris-buffered saline [TBS] + 0.1% tween 20), then incubate   at   with primary antibodies.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":39,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":144,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":149,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f5lti","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4rns4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"34joo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"3":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"bc5oi","text":"Antibody dilutions can be found in Table S1. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ee2el","text":"Wash the blots  with TBST, thrice, each  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":40,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2tjpj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3rp2i","text":"Incubate the blots with IRDye 680RD or 800CW (LI-COR) secondary antibodies (1:8000) for   at   in TBST.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":88,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":93,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7q34v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"93vou","text":"Image blots using the Gel Doc imaging system (Bio-Rad) using manufacturer’s protocols.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
